file_content.text: I think I've had my fill of Alderaan for awhile. We done here?
Oh, wipe that smirk off your face. Goof.
She could use an attitude adjustment, but Aitalla wasn't that bad in the end.
You know you're going to have to fill me in on the juicy details, right?
How long you think before Raffid bankrupts them?
Money's nice and all, but was putting Heitor in charge really a good idea?
I can't believe I lived through that... give me a breather, would you?
Better not tell the Huntmaster he was already dead... they might make us do another one.
This is starting to look a lot like Tatooine. I really hope the duke stays put this time.
What do you think the baron wanted to tell you? Seemed pretty urgent.
Sneaky rats! Served them right.
Ugh, are you nauseous? My head is spin--ulp. Oh boy... get me to a med center.
It doesn't feel right... double-crossing Zacar. I hope that was just an act.
This is so a trap.
Why do we always have to get sent to places like the "House of Assassins"?
You know she actually sent a nursemaid? It was a nice touch.
Well, aren't you Mister Chivalrous all of a sudden.
Did you see the size of that guy? What a porker.
I kinda feel bad... making that old man cry. Oh well.
Gotta give him credit, that old timer was really devoted.
I don't know about you, but I'm really looking forward to seeing this Royal Museum.
That's all of them. Finally. Let's go get that info from Malfus.
I get the feeling we aren't the only ones who think Malfus is a jerk.
I think I actually heard the moment you broke his nose.
Smooth, how much did you just pay that guy anyway?
I feel bad for those guys... throwing their lives away to protect this colossal jerk.
"Tokens of respect." Hmph, guess "bribes" wasn't fancy enough for him.
Look at you, all formal. Come on, "advocate," Lord Malfus is waiting.
Well, at least the baron's not rude. Stupid snobs.
I get the feeling we're the main attraction.
Come on, maybe if we're lucky, the duke'll still be at House Girard.
